About Our Family Business

Three generations of auto body repair excellence in Philadelphia

Founded in 1985 by Michael Johnson, Auto Body Shop Philadelphia began as a small garage with a big dream: to provide the highest quality auto body repairs with honesty and integrity. Today, that small garage has grown into one of Philadelphia's most trusted auto body repair facilities.

As a family-owned and operated business for over 35 years, we've built our reputation on exceptional craftsmanship, attention to detail, and personalized customer service. Now in its third generation of family ownership, our shop combines traditional values with modern techniques and technology.

Our team includes certified technicians with specialized expertise in fleet repair, automotive painting, dent removal, and collision repair. We take pride in our work and treat every vehicle as if it were our own.

We're deeply rooted in the Philadelphia community and committed to providing our neighbors with reliable, high-quality auto body services at fair prices. When you choose Auto Body Shop Philadelphia, you're not just a customer â€“ you're part of our extended family.

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about our auto body repair services in Philadelphia

How long will my auto body repair take?

Repair times vary depending on the extent of damage, parts availability, and insurance approval. Minor repairs like dent removal may take 1-2 days, while major collision repairs could take 1-2 weeks. We provide a detailed timeline estimate before beginning work and keep you updated throughout the process.

Do you work with all insurance companies?

Yes, we work with all major insurance companies and have established relationships with most adjusters in the Philadelphia area. We can help manage your claim from start to finish, including direct billing to your insurance company. Our team will help you navigate the claims process to ensure you receive the coverage you're entitled to.

What types of fleet vehicles do you service?

We service all types of commercial fleet vehicles, including delivery vans, box trucks, pickup trucks, service vehicles, and company cars. Our facility can accommodate vehicles of various sizes, and we offer specialized fleet maintenance programs with priority scheduling and volume discounts for businesses with multiple vehicles.

Do you offer a warranty on your auto body repairs?

Yes, we provide a lifetime warranty on all workmanship for as long as you own your vehicle. This includes our auto painting services, collision repairs, and structural work. Our warranty covers any defects in the repair work itself, giving you peace of mind that your vehicle has been repaired to the highest standards.

What is paintless dent repair and when can it be used?

Paintless Dent Repair (PDR) is a technique used to remove minor dents without affecting the original factory paint. It's ideal for hail damage, door dings, and small dents where the paint hasn't been cracked or damaged. PDR is typically faster and more affordable than traditional dent repair methods since it doesn't require painting. Our technicians are specially trained in PDR techniques.

Do you provide rental car assistance during repairs?

Yes, we can arrange for a rental car through your insurance company if rental coverage is part of your policy. We have partnerships with several rental car companies that can deliver vehicles directly to our shop for your convenience. If your insurance doesn't cover rentals, we offer discounted rates through our rental partners.

Have more questions? We're here to help!
